trends: There have been 229 other sightings in Las Vegas
There was one other sighting in Las Vegas on or around August 6th 2008
Summary: bright white light traveling at a high rate of speed in a zig zag pattern
divs: Sighting DetailsI saw a solid bright white oval light traveling at a high rate of speed across the las vegas sky from west to east. It did a zig zag pattern and then went straight up and disappeared. It was way too fast to be an airplane or helicopter. It crossed the entire las vegas valley in less than a minute,then shot up right before it reached Nellis Airforce Base on the northeast side of the valley.
